captions.text: - You have brain one that's really smart,

but you have brain two
that's really strong,
and will do whatever it wants.
(upbeat music)
- I can't be saying this shit.

- I was in Latin class, and
all of a sudden, I look down,

and I had an erection,
and there was no reason
for me to be sexually aroused.

It was like running
around, "I wanna party.
"I wanna party.
"I'm your penis."
I got called up to the front of class
to translate a sentence.
Oh, I was panicking.
I was like, I don't know what to do.
So I decided to tuck it into my pants.
I kept it hid.
I kept my weapon concealed.

And I was terrified that
people were gonna see me,

and people were gonna laugh
at me and point at me.
"He gets turned on by classwork."

But thankfully nobody
pointed and laughed at me.
- This was in P.E. class freshman year.

There was this one asshole
that really enjoyed
making fun of people.

His idea of making fun of
me was to draw attention
to his boner because obviously he gets off
from being mean to people.

What he didn't realize
is that since I'm gay,

I would get a boner from
looking at his boner.

I had to act like it wasn't
doing anything for me,
but unfortunately it kind of was.
- This happened in eighth grade.

At two PM, every day,
during science class,

like fucking clockwork,
I would get an erection.

And I needed to get up
to give a presentation.

I basically said, "Hey, Mr.
Mack, I'm not feeling good."
Cause it's a rager.
And he's like, "Oh that's a bunch of B.S."

After some argument, he
sent me to detention.

I head for the door, and I
try to go as fast as I can,

and then, someone, who I
am now good friends with
is like, "Ha ha, Steve's got a boner."

I don't think I ever
heard the end of that.

- So when I was in
college, when ripped jeans
were really cool.

I had a pair, and they
were definitely some holes
way too close to private areas.
As many men experience in the morning,
parts of my body began to awake.
All of a sudden I had this weird moment

where I realized the dragon
was about to leave the cave,

and thankfully, I had like
a really heavy textbook,

so I kind of just
whack-a-mole'd that sucker.
And we lived to see another day.

- Every time I'm on an airplane,
and the airplane lands,
I get a boner.

I hope that, by the time we
get to the gate, it goes away.
It never does.

What I do is I take my backpack
and shimmy out of the plane
and hope that no one else notices

that I'm not wearing
that backpack on my back.

I don't know if this
happens to other people,
but please tell me that it does.
- I was out with a girl.
We came across these sex pills,

which I thought would
be a fun idea to try.
They do a great job, too good of a job.
I took those sex pills on a Friday night.

Fast forward to Sunday,
and every year we have
this charity run for this girl in my town,
who passed away from cancer.

Now I thought there's no way
there's still gonna be any
of that in my system, but I was wrong.

I am still rock solid,
and I've gotta go see
all these people I haven't seen in years.
And I've gotta do that awkward butt out,

please don't let me press you
with my boner type of hug.

Somehow I was able to subdue
it for the race, thank God.

But right after the race,
I was back to bonerville.

It was a full four days
until I was back to normal.
- One time, I'd just woken up and walked
into the living room.
I think I was like 17.

My mom looks down at me and
goes, "you're saluting me."

comments.text:
My awkward boner story;



A couple of yrs ago I was in 8th grade! I was slim, skinny & fast! I 
usually play soccer but I was told that I was quick runner for a soccer 
player that I should try out track & field. So, as soon as I could I joined 
track & field in my high school Elmont. I wasn't the fastest guy in my 
school but I was in the top3 fast runners. So after afew practices @my 
school, we had our first match! 5 diff. high schools where also in the 
race. There were mad ppl that day, it was pack! I never been in these 
running competition so I didn't knew what to expect from these games. There 
were families & friends supporting the racers.
I was in a one-piece suit. It was uncomfortable & annoying & tight. There 
were alot of hot girls, sexy girls & beautiful girls, they were so 
attracting that my eyes just kept staring! Thats when I realized I was 
growing a boner!!!!! It wasn't that long when I realized my race was coming 
& I had to get ready to race. I was assigned 6 races that day. These races 
takes an entire day. Its about 10hrs of competition. Bout 657 dudes were 
racing. So yeah! I ended up telling my coach that I was beginning to feel 
sick. That day I had a boner problem & my races were canceled. I had a 
bulged just staring at the girls around! I became friends with two of them 
but after that day, I never saw them again! The End. ﻿
